Class JDBCFetch

java.lang.Object
  org.vivoweb.ingest.fetch.JDBCFetch

public class JDBCFetch
extends java.lang.Object

Fetches rdf data from a JDBC database

Author:
Christopher Haines (hainesc@ctrip.ufl.edu)
